stanza.line: If the dull substance of my flesh were thoughtthought
Injurious distance should not stop my wayway
For then despite of space I would be broughtbrought
From limits far remote where thou dost staystay
No matter then although my foot did standstand
Upon the farthest earth removed from theethee
For nimble thought can jump both sea and landland
As soon as think the place where he would bebe
But ah thought kills me that I am not thoughtthought
To leap large lengths of miles when thou art gonegone
But that so much of earth and water wroughtwrought
I must attend time leisure with my moanmoan
Receiving nought by elements so slowslow
But heavy tears badges of either woewoe
